page.title: 19Present Times
page.content: On{Thursday June 20th}a survey about {Guisborough}was conducted in{Westgate, in the{centre}of the{town.}It was {market}day.A sample of{124 people}were {interviewed}to find out where they {lived}and why they were in{Guisborough on{that day.68%}of those{interviewed {lived}in{Guisborough,}and many had lived there all{their lives,}but some {had moved}to{Guisborough}mostly from areas within{Cleveland,}but some had come from{different parts}of the {country e.g.London,Manchester,and some had even come from{abroad e.g. {Australia,South Africa. They had moved for{various reasons, {mostly}because of{work,but schools, {houses,shopping facilities}were also important{factors. Visitors}accounted {for 32%}of the{sample,coming from all {areas}of{Cleveland}and{beyond e.g. {Durham,}mostly for the{market.
